links.*: The Book of Lost Tales Part One

wikitext.*:
'''Kelusindi''' was the name of a river in [[Sirnúmen]], a place in [[Valinor]] where the [[Noldoli]] were banished, according to the early version of the [[legendarium]] in ''[[The Book of Lost Tales]]''.<ref name=Kel/>

Its source was known as [[Kapalinda]].<ref name=Kel>{{LT1|Appendix}}, p. 257</ref>

== Etymology ==
The name ''Kelusindi'' is in [[Qenya]], being a combination of ''[[kelu(më)]]'' ("stream; fountain, spring") + ''[[sindi]]'' ("river").<ref>{{webcite|author=[[Paul Strack]]|articleurl=http://eldamo.org/content/words/word-1545107689.html|articlename=ᴱQ. ''Kelusindi'' loc.|website=Eldamo|accessed=8 May 2022}}</ref>
